name: Shin Lift Demo
description:
My Youtube

My Facebook

This is the first game I am serious and determined and there may be more updates in the future and some of them may contain bugs. Because the game is still Damo

short story

It is the story of a king named Shin who lost something important because of breaking his promise to the devil.

This game was created by Tani Beast.

The engine used is RPG Maker Mv.

I plan to release 0.0.2 Beta this month. And the version 0.0.1 Beta in English in the next month as well Because i think Will be able to play it live more comfortably

From Tani beast
